[[Image:Time_youcover01.jpg|right|thumb|Cover of the December 25, 2006 issue.]]
 
'''''Person of the Year''''' (formerly '''Man of the Year''') is an annual issue of the United States [[newsmagazine]] ''[[Time (magazine)|Time]]'' that features and profiles a man, woman, couple, group, idea, place, or machine that ''"for better or for worse, ...has done the most to influence the events of the year."''<ref>{{cite book | title=Person of the Year: 75th Anniversary Celebration | edition=Special Collector's Edition | location=New York | publisher=Time Books | year=2002 | oclc=52817840}}</ref>
'''''Person of the Year''''' (formerly '''Man of the Year''') is an annual issue of the United States [[newsmagazine]] ''[[Time (magazine)|Time]]'' that features and profiles a man, woman, couple, group, idea, place, or machine that ''"for better or for worse, ...has done the most to influence the events of the year."''<ref>{{cite book | title=Person of the Year: 75th Anniversary Celebration | edition=Special Collector's Edition | location=New York | publisher=Time Books | year=2002 | oclc=52817840}}</ref>
